title: FIX THE ******* client!
body:
Every time you log in, chat messages are there from a week ago highlighted that you've read. You get alerts from gifts your friends opened 6 months ago. No matter what you do you can't get rid of the alerts to new skins or emotes no matter how many times you click on the damned thing.

Just once I'd like to log in and see nothing redundant popping up in my face annoying the life out of me. Code it right or don't do it at all. I'm sure I'm not the only perswon who's told you about this bug in the last 12-18 months it's been happening. Just.... Fix it.

I'm guessing they're messages from the server as it happens on multiple machines, which are the last alerts of their type sent to my machine and they're just not clearing, and on login it auto loads the last alert of type.... put a switch on them so that once they've been recieved once they don't send again.

Apologies for the super late reply;

It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.
Alrighty. Going to try it. Hopefully it not only resolves that issue, but the eternal lag when logging in, finishing a game, choosing a champ etc. Hangs on everything.
repairing now. Will let you know. ty
